document.full_text: two women have brought sexual harassment suits against georges tron, state secretary for civil service, with one saying she was emboldened by the case against dominique strauss-kahn.
document.title: 2 former employees accuse french official of sexual assault
lines_and_colors: two women have brought sexual harassment suits against georges tron, state secretary for civil service, with one saying she was emboldened by the case against dominique strauss-kahn.
